A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible. Just horrible. Rey was somehow able to fight off Snoke's imperial guards\, a force you'd expect to be extremely highly trained and kill Snoke without him noticing. This is despite her only having\, what\, about a week of training at the most? And don't even get me started on the Holdo maneuver.\n\nUgh. I'm just glad I didn't have to pay to see the movie. Well\, besides my time. 2 1/2 hours wasted.
